title: IGN Staff Responds to Management Censorship - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.18.21
description:
Spawn On Me's Kahlief Adams comes through to talk about the IGN staff reaction to their post being removed, GTA Online PS5 and Xbox Series X getting a date, and so much more! 

Listen to the http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames post-show to hear about how Kah reviews games and to get the show ad free. 

Follow Kah at http://www.twitter.com/Kahjahkins .

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:35 - Housekeeping
PS I Love You XOXO is live with the Trophy Room’s Kyle Stephenson talking about Starfield not coming to PS5, how the DualSense actually matters, and more! youtube.com/kindafunnygames.
The Roper Report   -
00:11:08 - IGN / Palestine Update
00:36:25 - Ads
00:39:04 - GTA Online PS5 and Xbox Date!
00:42:38 - Saints Row The Third Coming to Current Gen
00:46:00 - Is Devolver Going Public?
00:49:09 - No Hollow Knight at E3 2021
00:49:56 - GamesIndustry.Biz FACTS
00:53:00 - Out today
00:56:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Andy
